2.0.0-rc.0.deprecated: This package is now versioned independently from Apollo Server, please install the latest version instead

2.0.0-rc.1.name: apollo-server-caching

scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run compile

2.0.0-rc.1.description: Internally, Apollo Server uses the `KeyValueCache` interface to provide a caching store for the Data Sources. An in-memory LRU cache is used by default, and we provide connectors for [Memcached](../apollo-server-memcached)/[Redis](../apollo-server-redis)

scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run compile
